cz.cuni.mff.d3s.trupple.language.runtime.customvalues

Class PointerValue

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.d3s.trupple.language.runtime.customvalues.PointerValue

  • public class PointerValue
extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of pointer type variables. It holds a slot to the heap and descriptor of the type the pointers points to.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PointerValue(TypeDescriptor innerType) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean equals(java.lang.Object compareTo)
      Two pointers are equal if they point to the same heap slot.
      java.lang.Object getDereferenceValue()
      Returns the value in the heap to which the pointer points.
      HeapSlot getHeapSlot()
      Gets the slot to the heap (where the pointers points to).
      TypeDescriptor getType()
      Gets the type of the value the pointer points to.
      void setDereferenceValue(java.lang.Object value)
      Sets the value at the address the pointer points to.
      void setHeapSlot(HeapSlot heapSlot)
      Sets a new heap slot.

        clone, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
